#tfimport-terraform import google_compute_firewall.firewall_template  __project__/${var.name}
resource "google_compute_firewall" "firewall_template" {
  provider = google-beta

  name = "${var.name}"
  source_ranges = "${var.sourceRanges}"
  network = "${var.network}"
  allow {
    protocol = "${var.IPProtocol}"
    ports = "${var.ports}"
  }
}
